クラスの使用
org.sxb.data.exception.DataAccessException

  • DataAccessExceptionを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.sxb.data.exception  
    org.sxb.data.redis
    Root package for integrating Redis with Spring concepts.
    org.sxb.data.redis.connection
    Connection package providing low-level abstractions for interacting with the various Redis 'drivers'/libraries.
    org.sxb.data.redis.connection.convert  
    org.sxb.data.redis.connection.jedis
    Connection package for Jedis library.
    org.sxb.data.redis.core
    Core package for integrating Redis with Spring concepts.
    org.sxb.data.redis.listener.adapter
    Message listener adapter package.

    • org.sxb.data.exceptionでのDataAccessExceptionの使用

      org.sxb.data.exceptionでのDataAccessExceptionのサブクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  DataAccessResourceFailureException
      Data access exception thrown when a resource fails completely: for example, if we can't connect to a database using JDBC.
      class  DataIntegrityViolationException
      Exception thrown when an attempt to insert or update data results in violation of an integrity constraint.
      class  DataRetrievalFailureException
      Exception thrown if certain expected data could not be retrieved, e.g.
      class  IncorrectResultSizeDataAccessException
      Data access exception thrown when a result was not of the expected size, for example when expecting a single row but getting 0 or more than 1 rows.
      class  IncorrectUpdateSemanticsDataAccessException
      Data access exception thrown when something unintended appears to have happened with an update, but the transaction hasn't already been rolled back.
      class  InvalidDataAccessApiUsageException
      Exception thrown on incorrect usage of the API, such as failing to "compile" a query object that needed compilation before execution.
      class  InvalidDataAccessResourceUsageException
      Root for exceptions thrown when we use a data access resource incorrectly.
      class  NonTransientDataAccessException
      Root of the hierarchy of data access exceptions that are considered non-transient - where a retry of the same operation would fail unless the cause of the Exception is corrected.
      class  NonTransientDataAccessResourceException
      Data access exception thrown when a resource fails completely and the failure is permanent.
      class  TransientDataAccessException
      Root of the hierarchy of data access exceptions that are considered transient - where a previously failed operation might be able to succeed when the operation is retried without any intervention by application-level functionality.
      class  TransientDataAccessResourceException
      Data access exception thrown when a resource fails temporarily and the operation can be retried.
      class  TypeMismatchDataAccessException
      Exception thrown on mismatch between Java type and database type: for example on an attempt to set an object of the wrong type in an RDBMS column.
      class  UncategorizedDataAccessException
      Normal superclass when we can't distinguish anything more specific than "something went wrong with the underlying resource": for example, a SQLException from JDBC we can't pinpoint more precisely.
      DataAccessExceptionを返すorg.sxb.data.exceptionのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      DataAccessException PersistenceExceptionTranslator.translateExceptionIfPossible(java.lang.RuntimeException ex)
      Translate the given runtime exception thrown by a persistence framework to a corresponding exception from Spring's generic org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException hierarchy, if possible.

    • org.sxb.data.redisでのDataAccessExceptionの使用

      org.sxb.data.redisでのDataAccessExceptionのサブクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  RedisConnectionFailureException
      Fatal exception thrown when the Redis connection fails completely.
      class  RedisSystemException
      Exception thrown when we can't classify a Redis exception into one of Spring generic data access exceptions.
      DataAccessExceptionを返すorg.sxb.data.redisのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      DataAccessException PassThroughExceptionTranslationStrategy.translate(java.lang.Exception e) 
      DataAccessException FallbackExceptionTranslationStrategy.translate(java.lang.Exception e) 
      DataAccessException ExceptionTranslationStrategy.translate(java.lang.Exception e)
      Potentially translate the given Exception into DataAccessException.
      DataAccessException型の型引数を持つorg.sxb.data.redisのコンストラクタ・パラメータ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      FallbackExceptionTranslationStrategy(Converter<java.lang.Exception,DataAccessException> converter) 
      PassThroughExceptionTranslationStrategy(Converter<java.lang.Exception,DataAccessException> converter) 

    • org.sxb.data.redis.connectionでのDataAccessExceptionの使用

      org.sxb.data.redis.connectionでのDataAccessExceptionのサブクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  RedisInvalidSubscriptionException
      Exception thrown when subscribing to an expired/dead Subscription.
      class  RedisPipelineException
      Exception thrown when executing/closing a pipeline that contains one or multiple invalid/incorrect statements.
      class  RedisSubscribedConnectionException
      Exception thrown when issuing commands on a connection that is subscribed and waiting for events.
      DataAccessExceptionをスローするorg.sxb.data.redis.connectionのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void RedisConnection.close()
      Closes (or quits) the connection.
      void AbstractRedisConnection.close()

      static DataAccessException JedisUtils.convertJedisAccessException(redis.clients.jedis.exceptions.JedisException ex)
      非推奨です。 
      Converts the given, native Jedis exception to Spring's DAO hierarchy.

      非推奨です。 
      Converts the given, native, runtime Jedis exception to Spring's DAO hierarchy.
